Title: Increases the penalties for bias-related and gang related graffiti, and graffiti upon religious property
Summary: Increases the penalties for bias related and gang related graffiti, and graffiti upon religious property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to bias-related graffiti, the disposition of graffiti offenses, graffiti for the purpose of promoting gang related activities and graffiti upon religious property
